about_the_game:
"

Dragonix's Deadly Denizens



From: Dragonix Books


From the author of DM's Guild's Adamantine-Best-Selling Monster Manual Expanded series comes another monstrous bestiary! This tome is filled with a 
captivating collection of characters, creatures, and cryptids that will ignite your imagination and breathe new life into your 5th Edition fantasy campaigns. You'll have plenty of new monsters and combat mechanics to throw at your most seasoned players, enough to shock and surprise them and keep them on their toes!

  • This massive module
    contains over 300 statblocks!


  • Dozens of incredible commissioned artwork (as you'd expect from my products!)


  • Almost every creature is represented by a low, mid, and high-level statblock!


  • New demons, devils, dragons, drakes, giants, golems, oozes, beasts, and nonplayer characters!


  • New and improved templates: Abyssal, Infernal, Half-Dragons, Fiendish Dragons, and Vrykolakas (Vampiric)!



"
